goal.en: This course aims to impart a foundational understanding of spatial statistics and to instruct students in the utilization of R for the analysis of spatial data.
goal.ch: This course aims to impart a foundational understanding of spatial statistics and to instruct students in the utilization of R for the analysis of spatial data.

content.en:
Course materials, including lecture notes and handouts, will be accessible online and will encompass the following subject matter:
1. Geostatistics
2. Spatial models on lattices
3. Spatial point patterns
4. Space-time models
